titleStmt.title: The apology, or, The genuine memoires of Madam Maria Manchini, Constabless of Colonna, eldest sister to the Duchess of Mazarin written in Spanish by her own hand ; and afterwards made into English by a Person of Quality.
Apologie. English
titleStmt.author: Mancini, Maria, 1639-1715?
Brémond, Gabriel de.
Person of quality.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Magnes and R. Bentley ...,

notesStmt.note: Authorship also attributed to Gabriel de Brémond. Cf. BM.
Pages 124-125 are stained in filmed copy. Pages 115-130 photographed from Bodleian Library copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
